code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Opened: Issue created
    
    Opened --> Triage: Auto-added to project
    
    Triage --> Todo: Accepted & prioritized
    Triage --> Closed: Rejected / Duplicate
    Triage --> NeedsInfo: More information needed
    
    NeedsInfo --> Triage: Information provided
    NeedsInfo --> Closed: No response
    
    Todo --> InProgress: Work started
    
    InProgress --> InReview: PR opened
    InProgress --> Blocked: Dependencies / Issues
    InProgress --> Todo: Paused / Deprioritized
    
    Blocked --> InProgress: Unblocked
    Blocked --> Todo: Alternative approach
    
    InReview --> InProgress: Changes requested
    InReview --> Done: PR merged
    
    Done --> [*]: Issue closed
    Closed --> [*]
    
    note right of Opened
        Labels applied:
        - Type (bug/feature/task)
        - Area (ci/docs/etc)
    end note
    
    note right of Triage
        Platform/Owner reviews:
        - Is it valid?
        - What's the priority?
        - Who should work on it?
    end note
    
    note right of Todo
        Work is planned:
        - Priority: P0-P3
        - Effort: XS-XL
        - Owner Team assigned
    end note
    
    note right of InProgress
        Active development:
        - Branch created
        - Commits happening
        - Regular updates
    end note
    
    note right of InReview
        PR review:
        - CODEOWNERS review
        - CI checks passing
        - Approvals required
    end note
    
    note right of Done
        Completed:
        - PR merged
        - Changes deployed
        - Issue auto-closed
    end note

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 * 和 bug/feature/task 这一块。
不，其实叫 *处理 会更准确一点。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 '*处理'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'ci/docs/etc'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
